mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_funds (account_balance, frozen_amount, total_income, total_withdrawal, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{accountBalance}, #{frozenAmount}, #{totalIncome}, #{totalWithdrawal}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_funds SET account_balance = #{accountBalance}, frozen_amount = #{frozenAmount}, total_income = #{totalIncome}, total_withdrawal = #{totalWithdrawal}, update_time = #{updateTime}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
